mapper.select: select count(*) from schedule where sid=#{sid}
select * from schedule where sid=#{sid} and schedule_set = #{schedule_set}
select major from schedule where schedule_set = #{schedule_set} order by sno asc
select credit from schedule where schedule_set = #{schedule_set} order by sno asc
mapper.insert: insert into schedule(sid, subject_name, major, credit, subject_first_day, subject_first_hour, subject_second_day, subject_second_hour, place, subject_third_day, subject_third_hour, subject_fourth_day, subject_fourth_hour, schedule_set) values(#{sid}, #{subject_name}, #{major}, #{credit}, #{subject_first_day}, #{subject_first_hour}, #{subject_second_day}, #{subject_second_hour}, #{place},#{subject_third_day},#{subject_third_hour},#{subject_fourth_day},#{subject_fourth_hour}, #{schedule_set})
mapper.delete: delete from schedule where sno=#{sno} and sid=#{sid}
